title: Star Wars Battlefront 3 details
body:
No Space Battles
No Galactic Campaign
Co-Op Missions instead of campaign
20v20 Multiplayer
1st person default, 3rd person is an option still
No Clone Wars era at launch
No prequel eras at all at launch
No prequel characters
No prequel vehicles
Free DLC at launch of game
Tons of future paid DLC planned to support the game

At least the game looks fantastic graphically, right?..
